systems.name: Heating & Power
systems.description: The Ixeo I 744 features a Truma Combi heating system and dual power supply (230V mains hook-up and 12V leisure battery). The control panel allows temperature adjustment and power source selection.

images.alt: Truma Combi control panel located on the interior wall
images.caption: Truma control panel - adjust temperature and select heating mode here

images.alt: External gas bottle locker on the Ixeo I 744
images.caption: Gas locker location - check bottle levels and connections here
Mains hook-up inlet on the exterior of the vehicle

warnings: Never run gas heating while refuelling
Ensure adequate ventilation when heating is in use
Check gas bottle connections regularly for leaks
Do not block air intake or exhaust vents

systems.name: Water System
systems.description: Fresh water tank and waste water tank system with electric pump. The system includes a water heater integrated with the Truma Combi unit. Tank level indicators are displayed on the control panel.

images.alt: Fresh water filler cap on exterior of Ixeo I 744
images.caption: Fresh water filler - located on the exterior side panel

images.alt: Control panel showing water tank level indicators
images.caption: Tank level indicators on the main control panel

images.alt: Waste water drain valve underneath the vehicle
images.caption: Waste water drain valve - located underneath the vehicle

warnings: Drain water system completely before freezing conditions
Use only drinking water approved hoses for filling
Do not drink water that has been standing for extended periods
Empty waste tank at designated disposal points only

systems.name: Driving & Safety
systems.description: Based on Fiat Ducato chassis with safety features including ABS, driver/passenger airbags, and ESP. Maximum permitted weight and payload limits must be observed.

images.alt: Front view of the Bürstner Ixeo I 744
images.caption: Bürstner Ixeo I 744 - front exterior view
Cab area showing Fiat Ducato dashboard and controls

images.alt: Rear view showing bike rack and reversing camera
images.caption: Rear view - check camera and clearance before reversing

warnings: Check all items are secured before driving
Never exceed the maximum permitted weight
Ensure roof vents and windows are closed before moving
Check mirrors and cameras are properly adjusted
Passengers must use seatbelts while driving

systems.name: Beds & Interior
systems.description: The Ixeo I 744 includes a rear fixed bed and an electric drop-down bed above the cab area. The dinette can also convert to additional sleeping space. Interior lighting is LED throughout.

images.alt: Electric drop-down bed in raised position above cab
images.caption: Drop-down bed in raised/stored position

images.alt: Electric drop-down bed lowered for sleeping
images.caption: Drop-down bed lowered - ready for use

images.alt: Rear fixed bed in the Ixeo I 744
images.caption: Rear fixed bed with storage underneath
Lounge area - can convert to additional sleeping space

images.alt: Electric bed control switch on wall
images.caption: Bed control switch - hold to raise or lower

warnings: Ensure drop-down bed is fully raised and secured before driving
Check bed area is clear before lowering drop-down bed
Do not exceed bed weight limits
Keep bedding away from heating vents

systems.description: Quick reference for common issues including electrical faults, water system problems, heating failures, and general maintenance concerns.
